definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: light (late, Mish, id., cf. Aram. [[אוּרְתָּא]] evening-light, moon-light, star-light, etc.)

light of joy & happiness Es 8:16; pl. intens. [[אוֹרוֹת]] light of life Is 26:19 (light that quickens dead bodies as dew the plants Ew Hi De Che Di RVm; vid. Br:MP 303 cf. [[אוֹר חַיִּים]]; but Ki Ges MV Bö RV transl. herbs).
